attributes.action: To Scrap the current three Speed limits and make one Speed limit for all Veichals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Here in the U.K we have 3 Speed limits for our motors, Cars have a 70mph limit, buses & Coaches have a 62mph speed Limit, and HGV have a 56mph limit.

I propose that all motors should have a single speed limit which will reduce congestion and jams. It works in other countries
